details.content:
Opening yourself to new ideas can transform your business. We run startup incubation programmes around the world and connect businesses and governments to startups to get fresh ideas and develop tools and solutions.

Our work is underpinned by research and insights from clients in businesses and governments around the world. The ODI was co-founded in 2012 by the inventor of the web Sir Tim Berners-Lee and AI expert Sir Nigel Shadbolt to address today’s global challenges using the web of data.

Get in touch

Design and run incubation programmes

The right support and mentoring can be the difference between success and failure for small businesses, and bring new ideas and resources to investors.

As well as the ODI’s own Startup Accelerator programme – supporting startups working with data to grow and deliver impact – we worked with the Mexican Government and a local NGO to set up Labora, an incubation programme for social enterprises. As well as mentoring them on business models, open data platforms and fundraising, we linked the enterprises with government data holders so they could help build apps that Mexican citizens could benefit from.

The ODI’s expertise was essential in designing Labora, creating the strategy to make it sustainable and mentoring the startups themselves.

— Alejandra Lagunes, National Digital Strategy Coordinator, Government of Mexico

Contact us

We’d love to talk to you about how we can help you to design and run incubation programmes. Email us at bizdev@theodi.org or call us on 020 3598 9395.

Get fresh perspectives

Opening yourself to new ideas can transform your business. International consulting firm Arup wanted access to world-class experts and a network of open innovators to test concepts, technology and data that could revolutionise smart cities and the built environment. Through our partnership, Arup developed their data strategy and hosted graduated ODI Startups, offering new commercial insights and data expertise to apply in areas such as airport operations.

The ODI is full of high-quality and creative people who think at web scale. They share our values of a human-centred digital future, open and focused on value creation.

— Volker Buscher, Arup Director

Contact us

We’d love to talk to you about how we can help you to get fresh perspectives. Email us at bizdev@theodi.org or call us on 020 3598 9395.
